Key Responsibilities

  • Scope, plan and lead the delivery of engagements that enable the desired customer business outcomes.

OmniIntegrationProcedure.description: Creates a recruitment posting record and the recruitment content section records. Then, creates recruitment posting content section records that relate recruitment content section records with the recruitment posting record.
OmniIntegrationProcedure.name: CreateRecruitmentPostingandRelatedRecords
